import "./Auth.css" import { useAuth } from "../../context/auth-context" import { eventWrapper } from "@testing-library/user-event/dist/utils" export const AuthSignUp = () =>{ const {name,number,email,password,authDispatch} = useAuth() const handleNumberChange = (event) =>{ authDispatch({ type:"NUMBER", payload:event.target.value }) } return(
) }
